name: European Social Franchise Network
goal:
Promote the concept of social franchising and the social franchise offer of our members
Facilitate the development of best practice in social franchising and in our membership
Create a positive environment for the development of social franchising.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
Social Business Initiative
Employment policies and Social fund
Social entrepreneurship funds
Social innovation
